author: Gretchen Morgenson
title: MiMedx, Fast-Growing Developer of Tissue Graft Products, Didn’t Report Payments to Doctors
text:
MiMedx Group Inc., a fast-growing tissue-graft developer, has financial ties to more than 20 doctors, according to a review of doctors’ disclosures by The Wall Street Journal, but the company hasn’t reported these payments to the government under a 2013 law.

The company says its products, made from donated placental tissue, aren’t among those that require a disclosure of doctor payments. At least one of MiMedx’s direct competitors, Osiris Therapeutics Inc., regularly provides information on its ties to doctors and reported... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
